array.string:
The Nurse Who Loved Me return with their third full length album, ‘ILLUMINATE’ featuring the two singles ‘The Final Sleep’ and ‘Scared & Alone’ which were available as free downloads from the bands website.
The 12 track album was recorded and produced by the band as a 2 piece, with Guitarist/Vocalist Steve Weston also providing drum duties. Bassist Lee ‘Meat Arm’ Yates also wrote and played alot of guitar parts, making this album take a whole new direction to previous Nurse releases, pushing their big ambient sound, with more lush melody’s, this record is their most complete yet
